creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: container in the shape of portly female figure gathering folds of kimono in PR hand at chest; figure holds her PL hand up to her face coyly; hair is loosely tied in back; richly patterned gold, red, green, and black clothing; separates at hemline
medium: Glazed stoneware with overglaze enamel decoration
title: Box and cover (kogo) in the shape of Otafuku
